body:
It does sound reasonable. I guess I'm wary because of some of the issues we've had in the past where the restrictions of recipes / self-support meant that it was tricky to ensure things do/don't run in particular situations, and at a very high level this seems vaguely similar-ish.

I suppose the difference is that we're actively maintaining the side pulling in recipes here, and so if we do run into limitations we can address those in the add-on, and with go-faster it should be possible to do a reasonably quick roll-out.
